de.ibotrcp.db4o
Class StopServer

java.lang.Object
  de.ibotrcp.db4o.StopServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerConfiguration
public class StopServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerConfiguration

stops the db4o Server started with StartServer.

This is done by opening a client connection to the server and by sending a StopServer object as a message. StartServer will react in it's processMessage method.
